fn.p: Funding. AL was supported by a NASA NESSF Fellowship (Grant Number 80NSSC18K1271), the UTEP Dodson Research Grant, (Grant Number 30505610), and scholarships from the SIPES Geology Foundation, GSA Research grant, AAPG Southwest Section, West Texas Geology Foundation, and the AIPG-Texas Section. This research was supported by start-up funds to BB by The University of Texas at El Paso and start-up funds to JP by Universit√§t Hamburg.
